results.abstract: Many people are unpleasantly surprised when they hear recordings of themselves: Do we really sound like that?

media.copyright: Jessica Lehrman for The New York Times

results.title: Why Do Our Recorded Voices Sound Weird to Us?

results.abstract: Two North Koreans sought in the death of Kim Jong-un’s half brother fled to their country’s embassy in Malaysia. They are hardly the first to seek refuge in such sovereign spaces.

media.caption: Doan Thi Huong, 28, of Vietnam was charged with murder on Wednesday in Malaysia in connection with the assassination of Kim Jong-nam, the half brother of North Korea’s leader, Kim Jong-un. Two North Korean men wanted in the investigation have sought refuge at the North Korean Embassy in Kuala Lumpur.
